title: Webqoof: Is an Istanbul Artist Missing Sridevi? Well, No Mr Kher!
subtitle: Actor Anupam Kher recently twitted a video of a Coffee art claiming that the video was somewhere from Istanbul and the artist was drawing the face of Sridevi.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
The video is neither from Istanbul nor is the face in the coffee that of Sridevi’s.

In reality, it is an old Facebook post by a South African coffee house called Gloria Jeans Coffees, which had been put out on the country’s National Women’s Day.
